text: A taxpayer certifying in good faith that it is a Qualified High Technology Company shall not be subject to any penalties under this chapter if it is determined that the taxpayer does not qualify as a Qualified High Technology Company.

heading.catch_text: Penalties for Qualified High Technology Company.
